channel.title: Plz help
channel.description: How do i make a portal where u need to be member for to get in?

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

False your’s won’t even work right and no spacing.

By conventions you need tabs and brackets.

Without brackets it will only do the line underneath it.

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @Randomking17 Randomking17
item.description:
@Randomking17 wrote:

OH MY GOD, that is horrible!

First you didn’t use brackets, and that is so messy.

case 7319: // memberportal if(playerIsMember == 1) { teleportToX = 2340; teleportToY = 3170; sendMessage("You teleport to a member only area"); } else if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("You have to be a member to use this portal"); } break;

Plus he needs a members system for this to even work obviously.

Mines a lot LESS messy then that…

case 7319: // Mems Portal if(playerIsMember == 1) teleportToX = 2340; teleportToY = 3170; sendMessage("You teleport to teh pwnage member area!"); if(playerIsMember == 0) sendMessage("You need to be a member to access this area!"); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:2, topic:229041”]ok u need to find your portals part so in your client look for this //Portals now the portal u want to be member add this to it if(playerIsMember == 1) at the end the portal thing should look like this
case 7319: // memberportal
if(playerIsMember == 1)
teleportToX = 2340;
teleportToY = 3170;
sendMessage(“you teleport to the members area.”);
if(playerIsMember == 0)
sendMessage(“you have to be a member to use this portal!”);
thats my member portal[/quote]
OH MY GOD, that is horrible!

First you didn’t use brackets, and that is so messy.

case 7319: // memberportal if(playerIsMember == 1) { teleportToX = 2340; teleportToY = 3170; sendMessage("You teleport to a member only area"); } else if(playerIsMember == 0) { sendMessage("You have to be a member to use this portal"); } break;

Plus he needs a members system for this to even work obviously.

Read full topic

@krackkid wrote:

ok u need to find your portals part so in your client look for this //Portals now the portal u want to be member add this to it if(playerIsMember == 1) at the end the portal thing should look like this
case 7319: // memberportal

teleportToX = 2340;
teleportToY = 3170;
sendMessage(“you teleport to the members area.”);
if(playerIsMember == 0)
sendMessage(“you have to be a member to use this portal!”);
